entities.name: light
entities.description: The light is described as being ahead of the speaker and moving.

entities.name: passageway
entities.description: The passageway is where they reached the end of.

entities.name: chamber
entities.description: The chamber is described as being brilliantly lit and having an arching ceiling.

entities.name: ceiling
entities.description: The ceiling is described as arcing high above them.

relationships.description: The light is ahead of the passageway.
They reached the end of the passageway and saw before them a chamber.
The ceiling is part of the chamber.
